description: This file defines layout components for a React frontend application, including a main layout container and specific controls such as a top bar and sidebar navigation. It uses hooks for authentication and manages UI elements for filtering, searching, and user interactions.

methods.name: Layout({ sidebar, topbar, children })
methods.description: Main layout component organizing sidebar, topbar, and main content areas.

methods.name: TopbarControls({ onCreate, onSearch, search, setSearch })
methods.description: Component providing search, create note button, and user info/logout controls.

methods.name: SidebarNav({ tags, folders, activeTag, setActiveTag, activeFolder, setActiveFolder, clearFilters })
methods.description: Component rendering folder and tag filters with active state and clear filters functionality.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Layout({ sidebar, topbar, children }) {$/

ctags.name: SidebarNav
ctags.pattern: /^export function SidebarNav({ tags, folders, activeTag, setActiveTag, activeFolder, setActiveFold/
ctags.signature: ({ tags, folders, activeTag, setActiveTag, activeFolder, setActiveFolder, clearFilters })

ctags.name: TopbarControls
ctags.pattern: /^export function TopbarControls({ onCreate, onSearch, search, setSearch }) {$/
